608.name: Change to Clubs
608.description: The modified card will be considered  as a Clubs card

609.name: Change to Diamonds
609.description: The modified card will be considered  as a Diamonds card

610.name: Change to Hearts
610.description: The modified card will be considered  as a Hearts card

611.name: Change to Spades
611.description: The modified card will be considered  as a Spades card

612.name: Change to Neon
612.description: The modified card will be considered  as a Neon card

613.name: Wildcard
613.description: The modified card will be considered  as a Wildcard

300.name: Multiplied Hearts
300.description: Adds +2 multi for every played Heart suited card

301.name: Multiplied Clubs
301.description: Adds +2 multi for every played Clubs suited card

302.name: Multiplied Diamonds
302.description: Adds +2 multi for every played Diamonds suited card

303.name: Multiplied Spades
303.description: Adds +2 multi for every played Spades suited card

304.name: Pair Booster
304.description: Level up PAIR hand by 4 levels

305.name: Two Pair Booster
305.description: Level up TWO PAIR hand by 4 levels

306.name: Straight Booster
306.description: Level up STRAIGHT hand by 4 levels

307.name: Flush Booster
307.description: Level up FLUSH hand by 4 levels

308.name: Easy Straight
308.description: Straight hand can be done with 4 cards

309.name: Easy Flush
309.description: Flush hand can be done with 4 cards

310.name: Joker Booster
310.description: All played Jokers scores double points and double multi

311.name: Power-up Booster
311.description: All played Power-ups scores double points and double multi

312.name: Figures Booster
312.description: All played FIGURES cards scores +50 points

313.name: Multiplied Aces
313.description: Adds +5 multi for every played Ace card

314.name: Love is in the air
314.description: All played cards are considered Heart suited

315.name: The hand thief
315.description: Adds +1 hands and +1 discards to the round

318.name: Neon bonus
318.description: All Neon cards scores +20 points. Neon plays are leveled up by 2 extra levels.

319.name: Deadline
319.description: When playing your last hand, increase the play level 10 times

320.name: Initial advantage
320.description: The first played hand scoress +100 points and +10 multi

321.name: Lucky hand
321.description: Adds +50 cash for every Diamond suited card played

322.name: Discard mastery
322.description: Adds +10 multi if you have no discards left

323.name: Second chance
323.description: When you lose, this card gets destroyed but you can continue playing

324.name: Guardian's shield
324.description: Blocks all rage cards for 1 level. Gets destroyed afterwards

325.name: Neon synergy
325.description: If more than 50% of the played cards are neon, all the other cards get converted to neon

327.name: Blackjack
327.description: Hit exactly 21 with your played cards to gain +21 multi.

328.name: Efficient Play
328.description: Earn +15 multi and +50 points when playing 3 or fewer cards.

329.name: Special Sacrifice
329.description: Gain +1 multi (stacking) for every special card sold.

330.name: Rage Breaker
330.description: Gain +3 multi (stacking) for each Rage defeated.

331.name: Shortcut
331.description: Reduces the points needed to beat the level by 20%

332.name: Lucky Payday
332.description: Get extra 500 cash for every Joker in hand at the end of the round

333.name: Mirror effect
333.description: Repeats the effect of the special card in the left

335.name: Bonus Picks
335.description: 2 extra special card options in the store

336.name: Joker's drop
336.description: Get 500 cash every time you discard a Joker

339.name: Scaling factor
339.description: Upgrade all your hands by 2 levels

341.name: Undying Draw
341.description: First discarded hand gets leveled up

342.name: Shielded Start
342.description: Protects your first played hand from all negative effects

343.name: Full House Booster
343.description: Level up Full house hand by 4 levels

344.name: Three of a Kind Booster
344.description: Level up Three of a Kind hand by 4 levels

345.name: Four of a Kind Booster
345.description: Level up Four of a Kind hand by 4 levels

346.name: Five of a Kind Booster
346.description: Level up Five of a Kind hand by 4 levels

347.name: Dice of Hearts
347.description: Rolls a number between -2 and 6 to add to the multi for each played Hearts suited card.

348.name: Dice of Clubs
348.description: Rolls a number between -2 and 6 to add to the multi for each played Clubs suited card.

349.name: Dice of Diamonds
349.description: Rolls a number between -2 and 6 to add to the multi for each played Diamonds suited card.

350.name: Dice of Spades
350.description: Rolls a number between -2 and 6 to add to the multi for each played Spades suited card.

351.name: Special Multiplier
351.description: Gain +3 multi for each active special card

352.name: Deck Collector
352.description: Earn +1 points for every card in your deck.

353.name: Fury Reset
353.description: Allows rerolling Rage cards once per round. Costs 500 per Rage card in the round.

354.name: Skip Bonus
354.description: Gain +25 points (stacking) for each loot box skipped (opened without selecting a card).

355.name: Burning Rewards
355.description: Gain +25 points (stacking) for each card burned from your deck.

356.name: Slot Saver
356.description: Earn +50 points for each unlocked but empty card slot.

357.name: High Rollers
357.description: 1 in 2 chances to gain +1 multi (stacking) for each High Card played. Currently +{{multi}} multi.

358.name: Suit Roulette
358.description: Gain +5 multi for every card matching a randomly chosen suit. The suit changes each round.

359.name: Club Keeper
359.description: Earn +10 points for each Club card in your deck.

360.name: Spade Trio
360.description: If your hand contains at least 3 Spade cards, gain +100 points and +3 multi.

361.name: Twos Matter
361.description: Gain +30 points for every 2 held in your hand.

379.name: Rainbow
379.description: Gain +200 points and +5 multi if your play includes all four suits.
